title: 5 Healing Crystals And Their Properties
author: Annie Darling
description: Theodora Warre, who established her eponymous jewellery line in 2014, tells us everything we need to know about crystals.
cleaned_text: Widely used in healing, cleansing and meditation, here are five crystals you need to know, as told by jewellery designer Theodora Warre [Theodora Warre](https://theodorawarre.eu/), who established her eponymous jewellery line in 2014, tells us everything we need to know about crystals. 1. Amethyst Purple amethyst is one of my favourite crystals and I often incorporate it into my designs. The amethyst I use comes predominantly from Brazil, where they have many mines. This stone is quite hard and dense, which is why it's widely used in crystal jewellery because it doesn't break easily when being carved, cut or set. Amethyst is a powerful stone known for its protective qualities.
